room_title: Escape room "Casino Takeover" by ESCAPEability in Las Vegas
room_address: 3100 S Durango Dr, Suite 106 Las Vegas, NV 89117
room_description:
Travel back in time to the 1940's, when Las Vegas mob had an underground network of casinos and ruled the scene. You and your team will be tested by none other than Bugsy Siegel to see if you are clever enough to run his casino. Race against the clock or race against each other/another team. See who is worthy.
There are two identical Casino Takeover rooms at the location, each for 2-10 players. There is a window in between and you will be able to see how the other team progresses. Solo play is an option as well.
